name: Lip
text: I came to help you, but the Inklings cut me off.

name: You
text: Let's take on these monsters together!

name: Lip
text: Unfortunately I dont think I will be of much use.

name: Lip
text: The Inklings got to me, i'm injured.

name: Lip
text: But I came to tell you something.

name: Lip
text: The best way to save the art is to take it with us

name: Lip
text: Press R1 to take the paintings off the wall and with you.

name: Lip
text: You can practice on the painting next to us.

name: You
text: Okay, thank you Lip. I will do this...

name: Lip
text: Don't forget to use L1 to sneak past enemies, it might help you!
